mapper.insert: insert into organization (ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgSubtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesorgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divorgFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId4a,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgContractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgAreaLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update organization set PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_TYPE = #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_SUBTYPE = #{orgSubtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE_FLAG = #{villageFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_LEVEL = #{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_INDEX = #{orgIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SALESORG_CODE = #{salesorgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIVORG_FLAG = #{divorgFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_DIVISION = #{orgDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id_4a = #{orgId4a,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE = #{orgContractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_AREA_LEVEL = #{orgAreaLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DESC = #{orgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization where PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentId}
